name: dsm
text: You could try looking at [`caller`][1]. This is what the debugger uses to build stack traces, so maybe it is what you want. I don't think `__LINE__`, `__FILE__` and `__PACKAGE__` help you here as they only provide the location of the current point of execution, meaning that given a code reference or sub as in your code you will get the same results. [1]: http://perldoc.perl.org/functions/caller.html
